entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy ending this evening. Clearing this evening. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 42 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
